INSERT INTO ENCOUR_NOTICE( BBS_ID, BBS_NAME, ARTICLE_NO, TITLE, CONTENT_HTML, CONTENT_TEXT, CREATE_TIME, RDCOUNT, WRITER_ID, WRITER_NAME, MODIFY_ID, MODIFY_NAME, MODIFY_TIME, ATCH_FILE_ID, ATCH_FILE_NAME, USE_AT, ENCOUR_CATEGORY )
VALUES ( 'ENCOUR_NOTICE', '장학사업 공지 게시판', #articleNo#, #title#, #contentHtml#, #contentText#, sysdate, 0, #writerId#, #writerName#, #writerId#, #writerName#, sysdate, #atchFileId#, #atchFileName#, 'Y', #encourCategory# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ENCOUR_NOTICE SET MODIFY_ID = #modifyId#, MODIFY_NAME = #modifyName#, TITLE = #title#, CONTENT_HTML = #contentHtml#, CONTENT_TEXT = #contentText#, MODIFY_TIME = sysdate, ATCH_FILE_ID = #atchFileId#, ATCH_FILE_NAME = #atchFileName#, ENCOUR_CATEGORY = #encourCategory# WHERE ARTICLE_NO=#articleNo#
UPDATE ENCOUR_NOTICE SET RDCOUNT = RDCOUNT+1 WHERE ARTICLE_NO=#articleNo#
UPDATE ENCOUR_NOTICE SET USE_AT = 'N' WHERE ARTICLE_NO=#articleNo#
sqlMap.select: SELECT BBS_ID, BBS_NAME, ARTICLE_NO, TITLE, CONTENT_HTML, CONTENT_TEXT, TO_CHAR(CREATE_TIME, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') as CREATE_TIME, RDCOUNT, WRITER_ID, WRITER_NAME, MODIFY_ID, MODIFY_NAME, MODIFY_TIME, ATCH_FILE_ID, ATCH_FILE_NAME, USE_AT, ENCOUR_CATEGORY FROM ENCOUR_NOTICE WHERE ARTICLE_NO=#articleNo#

(TITLE LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%') OR (CONTENT_TEXT LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%') AND USE_AT='Y'

CONTENT_TEXT LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC, ARTICLE_NO DESC ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

sqlMap.select: select next_ARTICLE_NO as ARTICLE_NO, next_TITLE as TITLE from ( select ARTICLE_NO, TITLE, lead(ARTICLE_NO,1,NULL) over (order by ARTICLE_NO) next_ARTICLE_NO, lead(TITLE,1,'이전글이 없습니다') over (order by ARTICLE_NO) next_TITLE from ENCOUR_NOTICE WHERE USE_AT='Y' ) where ARTiCLE_NO = #articleNo#
